properties.name: fcm.connection.read-timeout
properties.description: Read timeout duration for the underlying HTTP client. @see JdkClientHttpRequestFactory#setReadTimeout(Duration)

properties.name: fcm.connection.ssl-bundle-name
properties.description: SSL bundle name for setting up SSL context in {@code HttpClient}. @see HttpClient.Builder#sslContext(SSLContext)

properties.name: fcm.credential.client-email
properties.description: The client email associated with the Firebase service account, used for authentication.

properties.name: fcm.credential.jwt-expire-duration
properties.description: The time period a JWT token remains valid, set to 1 hour by default.

properties.name: fcm.credential.private-key
properties.description: The private key from the Firebase service account JSON file, necessary for authentication.

properties.name: fcm.credential.private-key-id
properties.description: The private key ID from the Firebase service account JSON file.

properties.name: fcm.credential.project-id
properties.description: The project ID associated with the Firebase service account.

properties.name: fcm.jwt-token-pool-setting.max-idle
properties.description: Max number of idle JWT tokens in the pool.

properties.name: fcm.jwt-token-pool-setting.max-total
properties.description: Max total number of JWT tokens in the pool.
